meanings.sent1: The waves had a surflike rhythm, gently rolling towards the shore.
meanings.sent2: The surflike sound of the ocean was soothing to the ears.
meanings.sent3: The surflike pattern on the fabric made the shirt look cool and trendy.
meanings.sent4: Her surflike movements on the dance floor captivated everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The surflike breeze carried the scent of salt and adventure.

meanings.definition: To move or behave in a manner similar to surfing.
meanings.sent1: He surflike across the dance floor, gliding effortlessly with the music.
meanings.sent2: The skateboarder tried to surflike on the rail, mimicking the motions of a surfer.
meanings.sent3: The penguin decided to surflike on its belly down the icy slope for fun.
meanings.sent4: She surflike through the crowd, navigating smoothly towards the exit.
meanings.sent5: The robot was programmed to surflike on the waves of data, processing information swiftly.
